description: This file defines a NetworkModule object for configuring network API services using Retrofit and OkHttp, including a mock implementation providing sample data for testing purposes. It includes methods to provide ApiService instances, set up Retrofit with logging, and a MockApiService class with sample data and simulated delays for various API methods such as fetching products, user login/signup, and order management.

classes.name: MockApiService
classes.description: A mock implementation of the ApiService interface that returns placeholder data with simulated delays for testing purposes.

methods.name: provideApiService
methods.description: Public method to provide an instance of ApiService, either mock or real Retrofit implementation based on the useMock parameter.

methods.name: createRetrofitService
methods.description: Creates and configures a Retrofit instance with logging and Moshi converter, then creates the ApiService.

methods.name: sampleProducts
methods.description: Generates a list of sample Product objects with random attributes for mock data.
